text: Sergei Nikolayevich Nikolayev (; born 24 September 1978) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Torpedo NN Nizhny Novgorod players Category:FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Association football forwards
title: Sergei Nikolayev (footballer)
